Dialogue.Text: wow holy shit i thought i was gonna die
how convenient of u to show up at this exact time

Options.Option: who the fuck are u, identify yourself.

Dialogue.Text: the names feyden, im cool asf boi dont u forget it
i was headin around lookin for some loot when this big ass boar came outta nowhere
mean lookin mf, biggest one ive ever seen. chased me all the way down here this here hole
i thought i was safe but then i couldnt get out, before i knew i got captured by slimes.
speaking of which, we better get outta here before...
